name: The Nerve Game
summary:
You're running late for work. You've got too much on. You're stressed and tense and you desperately dodge your way through friends, bosses and parties in a frantic attempt to hold your life together.
See your stress and depression rise to levels never seen before! Watch yourself collapse then explode! Explore the part of your life you'd rather forget about!
It's all part of the fun of the Nerve Game...
